item.title: Employment History
item.description: Associate Software Engineer (Big Data Platform Management and Data Engineering) - Great Eastern Singapore Aug 2020 - Current System Analyst/Programmer - Finsurge Pte. Ltd Oct 2019 - Mar 2020 Worked with clients from a major financial institution Consulted with client on the scope and deployment of project Maintained and optimized various Grafana dashboards Maintained and queried data from client`s MySQL database Deployed logstash logging script to log the system load of client`s Murex server Deployed proprietary python scripts to parse and load logs into MySQL database Temporary Contractor - Institute of Infocomm Research, A*STAR May 2019 - Aug 2019
